thread.title: Retailers need to focus on security of debit cards with chips
thread.title_full: Retailers need to focus on security of debit cards with chips - San Francisco Chronicle

author: David Einstein
title: Retailers need to focus on security of debit cards with chips
text: The transition from magnetic strips to embedded chips in credit cards officially began in the United States last Thursday, the deadline set by Visa and MasterCard for merchants to have new chip-card readers in place and operational.
